answers.answer: i would definitely go to the hospital and get check. because it can be something very serious. hopefully everything is fine :) ! take care.

Hi, Thank you for your question. It could be a boil, furuncle or cellulites due to bacterial infection. Besides if it is non-healing then could be related to some other underlying diseases such as diabetes or repeated infections. I would recommend evaluating this out with the help of a skin specialist. Hope this helps.
thanks for the help. i an going to to got the docter if its still there this weekend. let hope its nothing bad.

question: It started two days ago. A large lump sudently appered on the left side of my skull near the neck. It is very painful when I touch it or the area around it.I've looked all over the internet but nobody seems to know any more then I do. Can somebody please help!
title: i got a lump on my skull
